title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce website with a custom CMS, payment gateway integration, and a responsive design that works on all devices.

title: Mobile Fitness App
description: A cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, setting goals, and connecting with a community of fitness enthusiasts.

title: SaaS Dashboard
description: A complex data visualization dashboard for a SaaS product, providing users with real-time analytics and reporting.

title: Company Portfolio Website
description: A modern, animated portfolio website to showcase company projects and services, built with performance and SEO in mind.
